properties.name: weather.refresh_cron
properties.description: Cron format for how often to query the weather API

properties.name: weather.api_key
properties.description: API Key to query the weather API, should be provided as an environment variable

properties.name: weather.units
properties.description: Wether to ask for metric or imperial measurements <'metric'|'imperial'>

properties.name: weather.http_timeout_s
properties.description: Timeout for HTTP request in seconds

properties.name: weather.very_high_temp
properties.description: Temperature 'C that we consider blisteringly hot in this country

properties.name: weather.freezing_temp
properties.description: Temperate 'C at below which water freezes (dunno why this is configurable)

properties.name: wallpaper.very_high_heat
properties.description: Image for a very hot day

properties.name: shortcut.urls
properties.description: List of URLs for the shortcut hyperlinks

properties.name: shortcut.images
properties.description: List of image urls for the shortcuts

properties.name: shortcut.alts
properties.description: List of alt text for shortcuts

properties.name: weather.icon_suffix
properties.description: URL suffix for weather summary icon

properties.name: weather.icon_prefix
properties.description: URL prefix for weather summary icon
